articles.description: England levelled the ODI series against India as Reece Topley took six wickets for 24 and England won by 100 runs at Lord’s
articles.content: On the third anniversary of Englands greatest moment in this format they returned to this ground with a performance that might, with a little effort, have sparked a few hazy memories of that World Cu… [+4446 chars]
